content.data:
[Y]Disk Speed Habits
[W]Organisation saves minutes every hour.
[c][m.]
[W]Group related assets and source files
[W]so your iteration loop stays fast.
[W]A clean directory plan is a
[W]performance tool, not just
[W]housekeeping.
[c][m.]
[G]- Name by module.
[G]- Keep archive disks.
[G]- Store release builds separately.
[m][m-]
[Y]TIP
[C]Two backup copies beat one heroic
[C]apology.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
